items.title: ESR’s iPhone 17 rugged MagSafe cases with Camera Control button now 62% off from just $12
items.summary:
While you can still grab a 3-pack of translucent iPhone 17 MagSafe cases for just $5 each, we just spotted another deal for folks looking for some rugged options. ESR’s Cyber series rugged cases for the iPhone 17 are up to 62% off right now, starting at just $11.99 Prime shipped. Folks without a Prime membership will have to checkout with items worth over $35 in the cart to dodge the shipping fee. Enter promo code ESR2025NEW at checkout to lock in the discounted prices. Both versions – with or without the built-in camera stand – are available for the standard iPhone 17, Air, and Pro models. The $30 standard rugged case is $11.99, while the one with the stand is down to $14.99 Prime shipped from $40.

more…

items.title: EU floats plan to use frozen Russian assets for Ukraine loan, bypassing a Hungary veto
items.summary: BRUSSELS (Reuters) -The European Union is discussing ways to use frozen Russian assets to underpin a so-called "reparation loan" to Ukraine to bolster its wartime finances and bypass the risk of a veto by Moscow-friendly Hungary, officials close to the project said. Read full story

Lawrence Abrams / BleepingComputer:
ShinyHunters claims it stole 1.5B+ Salesforce records from 760 companies using compromised Salesloft Drift OAuth tokens; a source says the figures are accurate  —  The ShinyHunters extortion group claims to have stolen over 1.5 billion Salesforce records from 760 companies using compromised Salesloft Drift OAuth tokens.

Aiper, as one of the leading brands in cordless robotic pool cleaning technology, has grown to be one of our favorite pool cleaning brands here at 9to5Toys – and it currently has an Autumn Sale going full swing through September 23 that is cutting up to 35% off tag prices, so you can get smarter assistance with your pool maintenance with notable price drops across its lineup. Among the models seeing these discounts, two stand atop the rest as the perfect duo to tackle all the cleaning needs of your favorite swimming hole right in your own backyard. You’re looking at up to $700 discounts here, with these high-quality robots down at some of their best rates of the year, especially when you’re scoring them bundled together. Leading the lineup, there is Bluetti’s new Apex 300 Portable Power Station bundled with an Alternator Charger 1 at $1,619.10 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS10F at checkout for an additional $180 in savings, beating out Amazon’s currently $1,799 pricing. This bundle would fetch 2,699 outside of discounts, with a higher $2,799 pricing at Amazon. Since its release at the top of August, this bundle has only been dropped between $2,099 and $1,799 outside of the exclusive savings on the series that is continuing with this sale. You’ll not only be getting $1,080 cut from the tag, but you’ll be getting the all-time lowest price we have tracked to date. Head below for the full lineup of discounted bundles.
